comments.body: Maybe link here to the original locking code and explain why it can't be used?
should this action be deferred as well to ensure that we will release it for sure?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@		ginkgo.By("releasing the lock on lock file i.e /var/run/kubelet.lock")
		// Release the lock.
		err = unix.Flock(fd, unix.LOCK_UN)
		framework.ExpectNoError(err)
